settings.fullscreen-desc_a:
Petlibro Pixie Mouse Interactive Pet Toy
“Run, Rover, Run!”

settings.title:
Catch Me If You Can,
Kitty Cat!
settings.description: Small, fast, and a challenge to catch, it stimulates your cat’s natural hunting instincts while helping them trim down their tubby tummy.

settings.title:
Off? On?
Keep Your Cat Guessing—
settings.description: Enters hibernation mode after 10 minutes of inactivity. After 30 minutes, it bursts back to life, recapturing your cat’s curiosity so they’re getting their daily steps in.

settings.title: Bedazzling Tail Lights—
settings.content: Captures your cat’s curiosity with a flashing tail of luminous lights. The kaleidoscopic greens, reds, and blues will spark their attention for truly enlightening playtime.

settings.title:
Keeps Tangles at Bay
for Longer Play—
settings.content: Prevent your cat’s hair from clogging the tires. You can even detach the tires for easy cleaning after long play sessions.

settings.title:
The Only Mouse
You’ll Want in Your House—
settings.content: Even when play gets rough, this toy can take a tumble. It identifies and avoids collisions, and even reset itself if it rolls over. You don’t need to do anything!

settings.title: Ready to Play on Any Stage—
settings.description:
Wood. Marble. Low pile carpet. This little motorized mouse can zip, zap, tumble and tease across almost any surface with ease.
Notes: Not suitable for high pile carpet.

settings.box_code:
What's in The Box
  • 1 x Interactive Cat Toy
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x Instruction Guide

settings.faq_code:
FAQ
